titleStmt.title: The campagne of the French King in the year 1677 In which is described exactly the three sieges and taking in of Valenciennes by assault, and of the town and citadel of Cambray, and of St. Omers, with an account of the Battel of Cassel. Licensed Sept. the 6th, 1678. Roger L'Estrange.
Campagna del re christianissimo nell' anno 1677. English.
titleStmt.author: Primi Fassola di San Maiolo, Giovan Battista Feliciano, conte, 1648-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Dring, at the Harrow at the corner of Chancery-lane in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Primi Fassola di San Maiolo, Giovan Battista Feliciano, conte. La campagna del re christianissimo nell' anno 1677.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Harrow at the corner of Chancery-lane in Fleet-street
